and O O
regulations O O
issued O O
by O O
the O O
Basel O O
Committee O O
on O O
 O O
Banking O O
Supervision O O

The O O
purpose O O
of O O
Basel O O
II O O
, O O
which O O
was O O
initially O O
published O O
in O O
June O O
2004 O O
, O O
is O O
to O O
 O O
create O O
an O O
international O O
standard O O
that O O
banking O O
regulators O O
can O O
use O O
when O O
creating O O
regulations O O
about O O
 O O
how O O
much O O
capital O O
banks O O
need O O
to O O
put O O
aside O O
to O O
guard O O
against O O
the O O
types O O
of O O
financial O O
and O O
operational O O
 O O
risks O O
banks O O
face O O

In O O
practice O O
, O O
Basel O O
II O O
attempts O O
to O O
accomplish O O
this O O
by O O
setting O O
up O O
rigorous O O
risk O O
 O O
and O O
capital O O
management O O
requirements O O
designed O O
to O O
ensure O O
that O O
a O O
bank O O
holds O O
capital O O
reserves O O
 O O
appropriate O O
to O O
the O O
risk O O
the O O
bank O O
exposes O O
itself O O
to O O

its O O

and O O
investment O O
practices O O

 O O

 O O
Project O O
02 O O
: O O
Concur O O
Invoicing O O
 O O
Concur O O
Invoicing O O
is O O
an O O
on O O
- O O
demand O O
, O O
Web O O
- O O
based O O
A O O
/ O O
P O O
application O O
that O O
will O O
be O O
implemented O O
to O O
 O O
automate O O
the O O
invoice O O
approval O O
and O O
payment O O
process O O

The O O
application O O
captures O O
vendor O O
/ O O
supplier O O
 O O
invoice O O
data O O
, O O
and O O
delivers O O
workflow O O
and O O
approval O O
capabilities O O
not O O
currently O O
implemented O O
in O O
the O O
 O O
SunSystems O O
AP O O
module O O

The O O
intent O O
is O O
to O O
decrease O O
potential O O
fraud O O
and O O
mistakes O O
, O O
while O O
increasing O O
 O O
control O O
, O O
compliance O O
and O O
visibility O O
into O O
invoice O O
payment O O
 O O
The O O
proposed O O
Concur O O
Invoicing O O
( O O
workflow O O
) O O
solution O O
should O O
accomplish O O
the O O
following O O
business O O
 O O
objectives O O
: O O
Automate O O
the O O
current O O
procure O O
- O O
to O O
- O O
pay O O
process O O
; O O
Deliver O O
an O O
online O O
solution O O
capable O O
 O O
of O O
providing O O
a O O
vehicle O O
for O O
employees O O
to O O
enter O O
invoices O O
, O O
route O O
them O O
for O O
approval O O
and O O
remind O O
 O O
approvers O O
when O O
time O O
has O O
elapsed O O
for O O
approval O O
; O O
